title: Plan CC4Me deployment for Will's setup
description:
Will wants his own CC4Me assistant. Plan out:
- How to push BMO's enhancements back to upstream CC4Me repo
- What Will needs to do to prepare (accounts, software, credentials)
- Homework instructions for Will
- README and documentation updates

Planning only — no implementation. Save output for Dave's review.

actions.note: Requested by Dave via Telegram. Will Loving wants his own CC4Me assistant on his Mac.

Comprehensive plan created covering: (1) Current state assessment — 15 commits ahead of upstream, 6 new skills, 18 new scripts, working integrations. (2) Upstream contribution strategy — 5 logical PRs (session persistence, email, telegram, scheduled jobs, documentation). (3) Will's homework checklist — software installs, accounts to create, credentials to gather, email provider options. (4) Deployment walkthrough — 8-step guide from clone to test. (5) README/SETUP.md update plan — proposed new structure covering all features. (6) Open questions for Dave and Will. Saved to .claude/state/research/cc4me-deployment-plan.md
